comments:
Steps:

1) Open a JavaEditor
2)Type "for" and Ctrl Space
- It will open the code complete
3)Select for(array,index)
- It will print
    for (int 1 = 0; 1 < 0. length; 1 ++) {
			
    }
  with a red square around "1".
4)Type "i"
5)Press arrow "->"
6)Press enter
- A internal error dialog will open and the following stacktrace was printed in 
the console:

It looks as if you're using an old version of the templates... can you try 
a 'restore defaults' in the template preference page and try again?

Which build version of Eclipse 2.0 are you using?
